Name: Premium Angus Beef Patties
Description: High-quality 80/20 ground beef patties, perfect for restaurants and burger bars. Each patty is hand-formed and individually wrapped for freshness.

Name: Fresh Chicken Breast Pack
Description: Boneless, skinless chicken breasts from free-range chickens. Perfect for grilling, baking, or frying. Pack of 10 large breasts.

Name: Gourmet Sausage Assortment
Description: Artisanal sausages including bratwurst, Italian, and chorizo. Made with premium spices and natural casings. Great for bars and restaurants.
